name: "Guten Morgen Österreich" show live from Mayrhofen
description: On Thursday, 4th May 2017, from 06.00 - 09.00, the ORF will broadcast its show "Guten Morgen Österreich" (Good Morning Austria) live from the Josef-Riedl-Platz in Mayrhofen. Sabine Amhof and Lukas Schweighofer are the hosts of the famous broadcast.Guest of the show is Stefan Verra. The body language expert analyzes how pop and other music stars stage themselves on the stage. As a studio guest Sabine Amhof and Lukas Schweighofer present world champion Matthias Schiestl. Together, they will talk about the topic "Climbing is good for the body". The Tyrolean regional guest Harry Prünster is also present. There will be a special gueast in the studio as a surprise and further highlights are planned to represent the region. The ORF and the Tourist Board Mayrhofen-Hippach are looking forward to lots of visitors and invite everyone to be present and live.
